abstract: Photos of amorous New Yorkers captured by New York Times photographer Todd Heisler.
lead_paragraph: A New York Times photographer speaks about anticipating a very private, yet public, moment.

headline.main: To Catch a Kiss on Camera, Wait, and Don’t Be Creepy
headline.print_headline: To Catch Kiss on Camera, Wait and Don’t Be Creepy

snippet: A New York Times photographer speaks about anticipating a very private, yet public, moment.
